Many roof leaks even on newer homes are the result of improperly maintained gutters. It is amazing how quickly they can fill up with leaves and other debris. If you do not have a gutter shield installed, regular checks should be performed and cleaning done when needed. The photo below was taken on a roof reported "leaking". After basic cleaning was done the "leak" was fixed! Left unchecked, debri in gutters can lead to rotting of facia material and other structural components of the home. It is also bait for termites, especially near the fireplace chimney.
